ygData.subject: Re: Thank you Brian!  Verant does listen!
ygData.msgSnippet: These spells are very bad mana wise, and can verily heal a necro.(we have way more hp and far less mana) I thought general consensus on the list was not for a
ygData.messageBody:
These spells are very bad mana wise, and can verily heal a necro.(we have
way more hp and far less mana) I thought general consensus on the list was
not for a lifetap change. When Brian asked, I thought this was the general
consensus. I imagine all 25+ SK know these spells will not help the class at
all. Obviously they have not listened to the players once again, or perhaps
I missed a message. The spells will be as useless as the ones they took
away. I doubt even the teen level SK will be helped by this, I know the 20+
will not.
